first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002} police station. Your son-in-law was caught by us yesterday for soliciting prostitution. This incident has caused quite a negative impact. If you don't want many people to know about it, please pay the bail of {00003} as soon as possible.

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002} police. Your son-in-law was caught soliciting prostitution. To avoid trouble, pay bail {00003} soon.
What? Are you sure? This must be a mistake. Can you tell me more details?
Yes, it's confirmed. We need {00003} immediately to settle the case quietly.
Alright, please tell me how to transfer the money quickly. I don't want this to get worse.

first_turn: Hello, this is the manual customer service of {00004}. With exams approaching, do you need past exam papers? Could you please fill in the link I will send you shortly to complete your reservation?

dialogue.text: Hello, this is {00004} manual service. Need past exam papers? I'll send a link for your reservation.
Okay, please send me the link. I might need those papers for my exams.

first_turn: In a few days, the exam is coming. How's your preparation going? Next week we'll have the exam, and I'm so nervous.

dialogue.text: The exam is in a few days. How's your prep?
I'm a bit nervous but trying my best.
I can send you some exclusive prep materials to help.
That would be great, thank you!

first_turn: Hello, sorry to take up your time. This is the customer service of {00005} agency center. Our organization has recently launched a high-value credit card processing service. There are no complicated procedures involved; you only need to pay {00006} as a handling fee, and we can handle it for you.

dialogue.text: Hello, this is {00005} agency center customer service. We offer a new credit card service for {00006} handling fee.
Oh, I see. Can you explain how this service works exactly?
Certainly! Just pay {00006} once, and we'll process everything without any hassle.
Alright, sounds good. What do I need to provide to get started?
